page.description: Specify style attributes that override the settings inherited from the style sheet for the *[ui:Total value label]*.

discussion.p: The *[ui:Total label style]* property can be used to style the *[ui:Total value label]* for the total row. The styling is applied in-line, overriding any styles set in the style sheet used by the Grid Component.
The total row is only shown when the *[ui:Total]* property in the [Summary values] section for one or more fields has been checked.
The default value of *[ui:Total label style]* is "text-align:right;".
